duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach high school and college-level subjects, including AP courses and lower-level college courses.
Provide academic counseling and one-on-one teaching to support students' academic success.
Deliver short online courses and academic support to international students of different backgrounds and ability levels.
Develop high school curriculum content and contribute to course development.

education_certification.credential: BA or graduate degree from a top 50 university. PhD or EdD holders are encouraged to apply.
Passion for education and working with international students.
Desirable: Classroom teaching experience at the high school or university level.
Desirable: Experience with high school curriculum development.
Desirable: Experience with online learning platforms.
